name: Dumb (But Deadly) Aliens ~ Crazy Ways to Die on a Fun Run Through Outer Space
name_original: Dumb (But Deadly) Aliens ~ Crazy Ways to Die on a Fun Run Through Outer Space
description:
SUPER simple & SUPER addictive!

If you love free simple addicting games, this one is for you!

Dumb (But Deadly) Aliens ~ Crazy Ways to Die on a Fun Run Through Outer Space is a super simple, endless side scrolling game. It's an old-school arcade style game with pixel graphics and neon colors.

Includes a leaderboard and Game Center integration so you can compare high scores with the world, and sharing on social media is enabled.

HOW TO PLAY

~ Tap the screen repeatedly to fly your spaceship
~ Watch out for the aliens (they are dumb, but deadly)
~ Collect the coins to earn points
~ See if you can get a high score

You're gonna love it, so download it now and tell your friends!
